           <span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft.btitle=Slovene-Italian+Relations+1880%E2%80%931956+%E2%80%93+Report+of+the+Slovene-Italian+historical+and+cultural+commission&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.kozina.com%2Fpremik%2Findexeng_porocilo.htm&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3ASlovenia">
            <span style="display:none;">

            <sup>

           <cite class="citation book">
            Borak, Neven; Borak, Bistra (2004). "Institutional Setting for the New Independent State". In Mrak, Mojmir; Rojec, Matija; Silva-Jáuregui, Carlos.
            <a class="external text" href="https://books.google.com/books?id=RJ6PHRLKGxoC&amp;pg=PA58" rel="nofollow">
             <i>
              Slovenia: From Yugoslavia to the European Union
             </i>
            </a>
            . World Bank Publications. p. 58.
            <a href="/wiki/International_Standard_Book_Number" title="International Standard Book Number">

            . Statistical Office of the Republic of Slovenia. 27 September 2017.

            <span style="display:none;">
            </span>
           </span>
          </span>

           Mihovec M., Barbka (2008)
           <a class="external text" href="http://www.gorenjskiglas.si/novice/priloga_moja_gorenjska/index.php?action=clanek&amp;id=18737" rel="nofollow">
            Kje so naše meje?
           </a>
           , Gorenjski Glas, 19 March 2008.
           <a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20130208093435/http://www.gorenjskiglas.si/novice/priloga_moja_gorenjska/index.php?action=clanek&amp;id=18737" rel="nofollow">
            Archived
           </a>
           8 February 2013 at the
           <a href="/wiki/Wayback_Machine" title="Wayback Machine">
            Wayback Machine
           </a>
           .
          </span>

            on 6 March 2012.

           <span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=Dela&amp;rft.atitle=Romska+naselja+kot+poseben+del+naselbinskega+sistema+v+Sloveniji&amp;rft.volume=27&amp;rft.pages=215-246&amp;rft.date=2007&amp;rft.aulast=Zupan%C4%8Di%C4%8D&amp;rft.aufirst=Jernej&amp;rft_id=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.ff.uni-lj.si%2Foddelki%2Fgeo%2Fpublikacije%2Fdela%2Ffiles%2FDela_27%2F12_zupancic.pdf&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3ASlovenia">

            Slovenska popevka: velik poudarek na pevcih in skladateljih, pesniki bolj v oklepaju. Enkrat še zapoj: 50 let Slovenske popevke Vladimirja Frantarja pri celjski Mohorjevi družbi.

      <h2>
       <span class="mw-headline" id="Further_reading">
        Further reading
       </span>
       <span class="mw-editsection">
        <span class="mw-editsection-bracket">
         [
        </span>
        <a href="/w/index.php?title=Slovenia&amp;action=edit&amp;section=57" title="Edit section: Further reading">
         edit
        </a>
        <span class="mw-editsection-bracket">
         ]
        </span>
       </span>
      </h2>
      <ul>
       <li>
        Stanić, Stane,
        <i>
         Slovenia
        </i>
        (London, Flint River Press, 1994).
       </li>
       <li>
        Oto Luthar (ed.),
        <i>
         The Land Between: A History of Slovenia. With contributions by Oto Luthar, Igor Grdina, Marjeta Šašel Kos, Petra Svoljšak, Peter Kos, Dušan Kos, Peter Štih, Alja Brglez and Martin Pogačar
        </i>
        (Frankfurt am Main etc., Peter Lang, 2008).
       </li>
       <li>
        <i>
         The World Book Encyclopedia of People and Places, O–S Oman to Syria
        </i>
        (Chicago, World Book, 2011).
       </li>
      </ul>

          <img alt="" data-file-height="193" data-file-width="193" height="27" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/d/dd/Wikivoyage-Logo-v3-icon.svg/27px-Wikivoyage-Logo-v3-icon.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/d/dd/Wikivoyage-Logo-v3-icon.svg/41px-Wikivoyage-Logo-v3-icon.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/d/dd/Wikivoyage-Logo-v3-icon.svg/54px-Wikivoyage-Logo-v3-icon.svg.png 2x" style="vertical-align: middle" width="27"/>
         </span>
         <span style="display: inline-block; margin-left: 4px; width: 182px; vertical-align: middle;">
          <a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikivoyage.org/wiki/Slovenia#Q215" title="voy:Slovenia">
           Travel guide
          </a>
          from Wikivoyage
         </span>
        </li>
       </ul>
      </div>
      <ul>
       <li>
        <a class="external text" href="http://ucblibraries.colorado.edu/govpubs/for/slovenia.htm" rel="nofollow">
         Slovenia
        </a>
        from
        <i>
         UCB Libraries GovPubs
        </i>
       </li>
       <li>
        <a class="external text" href="https://curlie.org/Regional/Europe/Slovenia" rel="nofollow">
         Slovenia
        </a>
        at Curlie (based on
        <a href="/wiki/DMOZ" title="DMOZ">
         DMOZ
        </a>
        )
       </li>
       <li>
        <img alt="" data-file-height="48" data-file-width="48" height="16" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/f3/Gnome-globe.svg/16px-Gnome-globe.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/f3/Gnome-globe.svg/24px-Gnome-globe.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/f3/Gnome-globe.svg/32px-Gnome-globe.svg.png 2x" width="16"/>
        <a class="extiw" href="https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Atlas_of_Slovenia" title="commons:Atlas of Slovenia">
         Wikimedia Atlas of Slovenia
        </a>
       </li>
       <li>
        <a class="external text" href="http://www.ukom.gov.si/en/promotion_of_slovenia/publications/facts_about_slovenia/" rel="nofollow">
         "Facts About Slovenia"
        </a>
        , publication from the Slovenian Government Communication Office. pdf. In English, Spanish, French, German and Russian.
       </li>
       <li>
        <a class="external text" href="http://www.mojaslovenija.si/" rel="nofollow">
         Slovenia – Landmarks
        </a>
        . Virtual reality panoramas of various spots in the country.
       </li>
       <li>
        <a class="external text" href="http://zgs.zrc-sazu.si/Publications/Sloveniaageographicaloverview/tabid/470/language/en-US/Default.aspx" rel="nofollow">
         Slovenia: a geographical overview
        </a>
        . Association of the Geographical Societies of Slovenia.
       </li>
      </ul>

             <tr>
              <td class="navbox-abovebelow" colspan="3" style="text-align:left;">
               <div>
                <div class="plainlist">
                 <ul>
                  <li>
                   <sup>
                    1
                   </sup>
                   <a href="/wiki/Island#Oceanic_islands" title="Island">
                    Oceanic islands
                   </a>
                   within the vicinity of Europe are usually grouped with the continent even though they are not situated on its continental shelf.
                  </li>
                  <li>
                   <sup>
                    2
                   </sup>
                   Some countries completely outside the conventional geographical boundaries of Europe are commonly associated with the continent due to ethnological links.
                  </li>
                 </ul>
                </div>
               </div>
              </td>

                     <a href="/wiki/Economy_of_Poland" title="Economy of Poland">
                      Poland
                     </a>
                    </li>
                    <li>
                     <a href="/wiki/Economy_of_Portugal" title="Economy of Portugal">
                      Portugal
                     </a>
                    </li>
                    <li>
                     <a href="/wiki/Economy_of_Romania" title="Economy of Romania">
                      Romania
                     </a>
                    </li>
                    <li>
                     <a href="/wiki/Economy_of_Slovakia" title="Economy of Slovakia">
                      Slovakia
                     </a>
                    </li>
                    <li>
                     <a href="/wiki/Economy_of_Slovenia" title="Economy of Slovenia">
                      Slovenia
                     </a>
                    </li>
                    <li>
                     <a href="/wiki/Economy_of_Spain" title="Economy of Spain">
                      Spain
                     </a>
                    </li>
                    <li>
                     <a href="/wiki/Economy_of_Sweden" title="Economy of Sweden">
                      Sweden
                     </a>
                    </li>
                    <li>
                     <a href="/wiki/Economy_of_the_United_Kingdom" title="Economy of the United Kingdom">
                      United Kingdom
                     </a>
                    </li>
                   </ul>
                  </div>
                 </td>
                </tr>
               </table>
              </td>
             </tr>
             <tr>
              <td class="navbox-abovebelow" colspan="2">
               <div>
                <ol>
                 <li>
                  <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Special_administrative_regions_of_the_People%27s_Republic_of_China" title="Special administrative regions of the People's Republic of China">
                   Special administrative regions of the People's Republic of China
                  </a>
                  , participates as "Hong Kong, China" and "Macao China".
                 </li>
                 <li>
                  Officially the Republic of China, participates as "
                  <a href="/wiki/Chinese_Taipei" title="Chinese Taipei">
                   Separate Customs Territory of Taiwan, Penghu, Kinmen and Matsu
                  </a>
                  ", and "Chinese Taipei" in short.
                 </li>
                </ol>
               </div>
              </td>
             </tr>
            </table>
           </div>

    <div aria-labelledby="p-personal-label" class="" id="p-personal" role="navigation">
     <h3 id="p-personal-label">
      Personal tools
     </h3>
     <ul>
      <li id="pt-anonuserpage">
       Not logged in
      </li>
      <li id="pt-anontalk">
